title: The Guardian of Gunrock (gnv64)

The Guardian of Gunrock - 24 Short Stories
Children's Book Trust | 2009 | ISBN 978-81-89750-98-5 | 148 pages | PDF | 15.3 mb

Truth, they say, is stranger than fiction. If that be so, how does one define 'strangeness', especially when it comes camouflaged in bitter-sweet memories of incidental recall and sudden, hazy flashbacks?
